## About Me
My name is **Mahima Malhotra** and I am a freshman studying Computer Science at Purdue University.

## About the Project
My project *Car Weight relationship to Fuel Efficiency* explores how the weight of a car may relate to how fuel efficient it is.

### Goals
* Show how heavier weight relates to lower fuel efficiency
* Explore the implications of increase production of lighter cars
*   + Correlation vs causation
